header.title: Waxing Crescent

card-of-the-day.title: Card of The Day
card-of-the-day.subtitle: The High Priestess
card-of-the-day.description-2: Trust your intuition today and pay attention to your dreams. The High  Priestess encourages you to look beyond the surface and listen to your  inner wisdom.

introduce.title: Natal Chart
introduce.text-one: To discover your Natal Chart, enter your birth date
introduce.text-two: Your Natal Chart reveals the blueprint of your personality, guiding you to enhance your lifestyle and connections with clarity.

subscription.title: Subscription Required

subscription.description: Unfortunately, saving your readings isn't available in the free version. Choose the plan that suits you best and track your destiny through your personal journal!
